description:
This package is only the navigation software. Now that Linux is getting more popular, we're getting less technically inclined users on the platform. It would help the popularity if we help them better by explaining these 'obvious' things.
get your map at maps.navit-project.org
useless if I cant use it on my phone
summary: does not work on the pinephone (manjaro-arm)

description: Doesn't work on Pinephone. The interface doesn't load.

Doesn't seem to work correctly. The menu options are confusing and it's hard to tell if something is not configured correctly or if the app is broken. Regardless, this is unusable in it's current state.
summary: Doesn't show any actual maps. Just a blank yellow background
